scripts.task1: cd apps/queue-management-api && sleep 1 && bun run dev
scripts.dev: bunx concurrently 'bun run task1' 'bun run task2' 'bun run task3'
scripts.install: cd apps/queue-management-api && bun install && cd ../mock-iot-api && bun install && cd ../queue-management-dashboard && bun install
